chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info:
Seonid Traighan,
      p. 77â€”Aes Sedai
      of the Green Ajah.  She grew up in Cairhien.  She was part of Salidar's
      embassy to Rand.  She now travels with
      Perrin and company.  She has two Warders.
      See also
      Alharra, Furen;
      Wynter, Teryl.
